product.detailsText: Built with balanced proportions for modern interiors, engineered for daily comfort and durability.
product.materialsText: Premium hardwood frame, performance fabric, and low-sheen finish. Clean with a soft cloth and mild soap.
product.shippingText: Delivery in 3-7 business days in major regions. 30-day easy returns for unused products.
product.qualityNote: Crafted premium finish, protected packaging, and insured delivery included.

account.scanQr: Scan QR in your authenticator app
account.name: Name

aboutPage.title: About Furni Enterprise
aboutPage.description: Furni Enterprise began with a simple goal: make premium, design-forward furniture practical for everyday homes and studios.
aboutPage.missionDesc: Deliver reliable, modern furniture that balances aesthetic clarity with real-world comfort and durability.
aboutPage.visionDesc: Become the most trusted destination for intentional interiors through design, fair value, and consistent service.

quality.title: Crafted Quality
quality.description: Every piece is selected for durability, material integrity, and long-term use.

design.title: Responsible Design
design.description: We prioritize mindful sourcing and timeless design over short-lived trends.

service.title: Trusted Service
service.description: Transparent support, secure checkout, and dependable delivery are our baseline.

living.title: Intentional Living
living.description: Our collections help create calm, practical interiors that feel thoughtfully curated.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: For custom interior projects, product questions, and delivery details, our team is available every day.
